mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe_member_grade( cafe_member_grade_no , cafe_no , member_grade_code , grade_name , required_visit_count, required_reply_count, required_post_count, cafe_grade_active_flag ) VALUES( seq_member_grade_no.NEXTVAL , #{cafeGradeNo} , #{cafeNo} , #{memberGradeCode} , #{gradeName} , #{requiredVisitCount} , #{requiredReplyCount} , #{requiredPostCount}, '1')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cafe_member_grade WHERE cafe_no = #{cafeNo} and cafe_grade_active_flag = 1

SELECT g.cafe_member_grade_no, g.cafe_no, g.member_grade_code, g.grade_name, g.required_visit_count, g.required_post_count, g.required_reply_count, g.cafe_grade_active_flag, g.auto_upgrade_flag FROM cafe c, cafe_member_grade g WHERE c.cafe_no=g.cafe_no AND g.cafe_grade_active_flag = 1 AND c.url=#{cafeURL}

SELECT member_grade_code,cafe_member_grade_no, cafe_no, grade_name ,required_visit_count, required_reply_count, required_post_count, cafe_grade_active_flag, auto_upgrade_flag FROM cafe_member_grade WHERE cafe_no = #{cafeNo} and member_grade_code NOT IN ('cg100','cg101') AND ROWID IN (SELECT MIN(ROWID) FROM cafe_member_grade GROUP BY member_grade_code) ORDER BY cafe_member_grade_no
SELECT cafe_member_grade_no FROM cafe_member_grade WHERE cafe_no = #{cafeNo} and member_grade_code ='cg102'
